LP1.headerTitle: In Morgi you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.
LP1.headerSubTitle: Morgi is where fans will love you for your personality. In Morgi, fans will connect with you, chat, and show their love with tips, monthly support, crowdfunded dreams and invitations to unforgettable activities.
LP1.suceedSectionTitle: In Morgi, it’s not just the top 2% who succeed
LP1.suceedSectionSubTitle: Unlike other fansites, Morgi fuels your growth with constant free organic exposure on our feed.
LP1.suceedBlockTitle: Crowdfund your dreams with Morgi’s exclusive Goals system
LP1.suceedBlockSubTitle: Bring your audience to join your new fans Morgi gets you and make your dreams come true with crowdfunded Goals in Morgi: let them buy you anything from a Luis Vuitton handbag to a brand new phone!

LP2.headerTitle: In Morgi you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.
LP2.headerSubTitle: Morgi is the perfect off-camera complement to your on-camera life. Here, clients will connect with you, chat and love you for your true personality, earning you BIG MONEY just for who you are; and you can link them back to your camsite at any stage.
LP2.suceedSectionTitle: Morgi is all about letting you earn long term, even as passive income while offline:
LP2.suceedSectionSubTitle: with clients showing their love with monthly recurring support and coming together to crowdfund anything you dream of - even when you’re not on site!
LP2.suceedBlockTitle: Best of all. Morgi can work hand in hand with your cam career.
LP2.suceedBlockSubTitle: On Morgi you’ll find new clients everyday, who will be eager to deepen their connection and have fun: tons of new viewers Morgi allows you to link to your cam shows at any stage.
LP2.recipeTitle: Whether you want to continue the cam life, or shift gears, in Morgi you can:
LP2.recipeCard1SubTitle: your audience for the connection they crave.
LP2.recipeCard2SubTitle: your client base with Friends Morgi brings you for free
LP2.recipeCard3SubTitle: without going live and with four mind blowing monetization options
LP2.recipeCard4SubTitle: here clients will love and pay you because of your personality!

LP3.headerTitle: In Morgi you can chat, connect, and have the time of your life.
LP3.headerSubTitle: Morgi is the perfect compliment to your Instagram account, where your followers, pictures, and personality will finally earn you big money.
LP3.profitTitle: The Power of Morgi's Monetization: 4 Fantastic Options
LP3.footerText: Earn off your fans and find new ones every day who will pay to connect, chat and will invite you to amazing activities!

LP4.headerTitle: Morgis is a social community where you can chat, connect, and have a great time
LP4.headerSubTitle: Morgis is where your communication skills and human relations career path are recognized as a talent - and where others are willing to pay for your online time.
LP4.percentageText: Morgis: the talent platform that showcases your social skills, handles your billing, drives you all the traffic, still ensures you receive the majority: still gives you the lion's share of the revenue: 70%!
LP4.footerText: Earn off your fans and find new ones every day who will pay to connect, chat and will invite you to amazing activities!

percentageText: The best part? Morgi works perfectly alongside other fansites to help you monetize with mind blowing options. You’ll keep the lion’s share of what you earn in Morgi:

moneySectionText: Morgi's innovative focus on activities means Friends can invite you to exclusive and luxurious activities, such as VIP concerts, private yachting, high-end fashion shopping and more!
